name: DEMO - If Jet Proposed to Emilia
name_original: DEMO - If Jet Proposed to Emilia
description: This is a demo for the seventh(!) entry in the Jet Series, "If Jet Proposed to Emilia." It's a fairly short demo, only containing the intro and a bit of walking around and talking to people. If that sounds interesting to you, by all means, please give it a look! Otherwise, please look forward to the full release of the game, probably in the next jam.
